participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emily finds joy in her children's laughter and the peacefulness of crafting.
participant_1.background: I am used to waking up early for work, but I prefer to sleep in on my days off. I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby. I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents. I'd love to share some of my crochet patterns with you! I spent my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching the stars.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Playful and dedicated, Michael loves engaging with his children and creating a loving home environment.
participant_2.background: I have a baby mobile in my nursery that plays classical music to help my child sleep. I never told my parents about my deployment, but I would tell my friends all about it if I was famous. My favorite band is Nightwish. I'm a homebody, but I love my kids! My favorite food is pasta.

content.text: I'm a homebody, but I love my kids!  What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my kids and making crafts.  What crafts do you enjoy doing?
I love to crochet and knit.  I also enjoy making jewelry.  What kind of crafts do you like to do?
I love making jewelry too!  I also enjoy painting and drawing.
Those are both great hobbies!  I love doing arts and crafts.  What are your favorite colors?
I love all the colors of the rainbow!  But my favorite colors are blue and purple.  What are your favorite colors?
My favorite colors are blue and green.  I love the way they look together.  What's your favorite thing to do with your kids?
I love to take them to the park and play games.  We also enjoy going to the zoo and the library.  What do you like to do with your kids?
I love to take my kids to the park and play games too.  We also enjoy going to the zoo and the library.  I love spending time with my kids!
I'm glad to hear that you enjoy spending time with your kids!  It's so important to make memories with them while they're young.
I agree!  I love making memories with my kids.  I'm so grateful to be their mother
